mapper.select: select max(dayId)+1 from ChargeBillReceipt where createTime >= #{today}
mapper.insert: insert into ChargeBillReceipt(dayId, operatorId, createTime, lastModifiedTime, receiptState, retailerID,transferList,total) values(#{dayId}, #{operatorId}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{receiptState}, #{retailerId},#{transferList, typeHandler=MyJsonHandler},#{total})
mapper.delete: delete from ChargeBillReceipt where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.select: select * from ChargeBillReceipt where createTime >= #{begin} and createTime <= #{end}
